movie_title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
title: Loved the characters but over hyped
review: I put this on expecting to be blown away with revelations for myself, lots of tears, and lots of love for the movie. And I did really like it and I should be loving it considering the music mentioned in this film & Ezra Miller. I feel like the ending got to busy, is the best way I could put it.
